comments:
I20060428-0010

- I have seen the following exception in the log a couple of times with recent builds.
- Everything appears to work ok
- Not sure whether the problem is with jdt-text (who owns the reconciler) or team (who's class takes long to load). From the resolution in the very similar bug 131701 (see bug 131701 comment 11 ff.) it appears that the problem may be a long loading time of the team class / plug-in. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi 4 0 2006-04-28 17:22:52.831
!MESSAGE While loading class "org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider", thread "org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.text.JavaReconciler" timed out waiting (5000ms) for thread "main" to finish starting bundle "org.eclipse.team.cvs.core". To avoid deadlock, thread "org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.text.JavaReconciler" is proceeding but "org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider" may not be fully initialized.
!STACK 0

The log messages just indicate a potential problem but they rarely indicate an actual problem. We will adress this for RC3.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 138771 ***
